forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: noil

comments.text: he hasn't said a whole lot since i found him. he mostly comes out when there might be a storm. there hasn't been any real lightning for a long time now.
i herd him mention something about "stratus" or whatever. i haven't been there in a long time but i rekon it's worth visiting at some point. hopefully it's still intact.
i'm starting to question his inteligence. i had to pry him out of a manky looking shoe left on the mountin path. i wasn't really aware of it last time i checked so there's that.
i haven't been keeping track of him for a while now, he doesn't seem to be around home base anymore, although i think i might know were he is. i'll hopefully update soon.
i suspect a bog witch might have captured him but i'm not really ready to deal with them yet. they can be very tricky to deal with in home teratory.
i realise theres probably not much reason to take him back, he seems fine and it's hard to keep him when i explore underground. i'll keep checking though.

thread.latestCommentText: i realise theres probably not much reason to take him back, he seems fine and it's hard to keep him when i explore underground. i'll keep checking though.
